Prerequisite
---
- Require *data.table* and *reshape2* librareis.
- Data is downloaded (tested on Windows and in Rstudio), however do not unpack it. This will require input from the user and may differ for different operating systems.
- The UCI HAR Dataset must be availble in a directory called "UCI HAR Dataset"

run_analysis.R does the following
---
- Firstly data sets are loaded.
- Appropriate column naming is performed.
- Selecting columns for which the mean and standard deviation is availlible.
- Training and Test data sets are merged.
- Reshaping and create a tidy data set.
- Tidy data set is written into a file.

The end result is shown in the file tidy.cvs
